title: The Heroic Week of Jin Perez
summary: Follow Jin Perez, a 55-year-old who discovers his superpowers while balancing his love for reading and coaching, facing challenges and transforming his community over the course of one week.
summaryGerman: Begleiten Sie Jin Perez, einen 55-Jährigen, der seine Superkräfte entdeckt, während er seine Liebe zum Lesen und Coaching ausgleicht, Herausforderungen meistert und im Laufe einer Woche seine Gemeinschaft verwandelt.
summaryDutch: Volg Jin Perez, een 55-jarige die zijn superkrachten ontdekt terwijl hij zijn liefde voor lezen en coachen in evenwicht brengt, uitdagingen aangaat en in de loop van een week zijn gemeenschap transformeert.
summaryFrench: Suivez Jin Perez, 55 ans, qui découvre ses super-pouvoirs tout en équilibrant son amour pour la lecture et le coaching, relevant des défis et transformant sa communauté au cours d'une semaine.

story.text: Jin discovers he can manipulate time while reading an old mystical book. He stops a near accident in town, feeling triumphant.
With newfound skills, Jin struggles to control them, accidentally aging a tree in a park while practicing. He feels a mix of energy and eeriness.
Jin uses his time powers to help a struggling student relive parts of a sports game, improving his coaching technique and feeling uplifted.
Rumors start about a local 'time wizard'. Jin feels uneasy but reads stories to children, finding solace and peace.
Confronted by curious townspeople, Jin demonstrates his abilities by restoring the town’s old library, gaining support and feeling epic.
Jin organizes a community event at the newly restored library. His romantic interest confesses her admiration for his actions, adding a romantic conclusion to the day.
Reflecting on his week, Jin feels happy knowing he has changed lives, deciding to use his powers openly as a protector of his town.

ending: Thus, Jin Perez found a new purpose, in both time and spirit, as the guardian of the temporal threads that weave through his town.
moral: Every person has the power to make significant changes, sometimes all it takes is discovering the strengths hidden within.
